settings.cosy.cloudModel.AutoTriggerDisp: Show inline suggestions when the IDE autocompletes shown
settings.cosy.localModel.enable.descript: Enable Completion (Works when Cloud Model or Cloud Model Auto Trigger is disabled)
settings.cosy.dedicatedDomainURLdescript: Dedicated Domain URL, e.g. http(s)://aliyun.com. Changes will take effect after restart VSCode
settings.cosy.enable.project.rules:
Enable Project Rules. These rules will be applied to your requests. You can view examples in the [documentation](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/2872908.html). 

 [Edit in project_rules.md](command:tongyi.open.project_rule)
settings.cosy.cloudModel.LanguagesOrFile: Disable completions for specified [languages](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/identifiers) or file extensions, please separate by commas
settings.cosy.other.commandAllowlistInCh: Add commands here if only specific commands should be executed automatically, please separate by commas
settings.cosy.other.webToolsInAsk/AgentM: Allows the chat in Ask/Agent mode to search the web or fetch content from a URL for information.
Allow Agent mode to auto-execute MCP tools
settings.cosy.other.HTTPProxy.descriptio: Works when HTTP Proxy Mode is manual
settings.cosy.other.LocalStoragePath.des: Set the Local Storage Path, changes will take effect after restart VSCode
settings.cosy.other.PreferredLanguageFor: Set up your preferred language when chatting with Lingma
Set up your preferred language when generating commit message

exception.auth.outOfLimit.chat: It looks like we've had a lot of back-and-forth today! I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm in need of a little break now. Apologies for cutting our conversation short. I'm excited to catch up with you tomorrow!
exception.auth.outOfLimit.completion: It looks like we've both been at this coding session for quite a while today. I think it's time for a little break and I'll be back tomorrow.

exception.crash.error: Unknown exception occurred in Lingma Plugin. You can report logs to help the Lingma team optimize the plugin.
cosy.description: solve your questions with AI assistant
chatMode.tooltip.agent: Agent mode supports decision-making, codebase awareness, and tool utilization. Use it for high-level tasks. Let AI reason, plan, and apply changes across your codebase automatically.
chatMode.tooltip.chat: Ask mode offers comprehensive development knowledge and provides real-time assistance to resolve coding issues as they arise.
chatMode.tooltip.edit: Edit mode (AI Developer) enables multi-file edits. Use natural language to make precise changes across your project, and maintain full control over the edits proposed by Lingma.
WelcomePage.intro-login1.1: Hello! I’m Lingma, an AI Coding Assistant with you. Feel free to ask me coding-related questions or share
WelcomePage.intro-login1.2: to help me improve. To learn more about my capabilities, updates, and Editions, visit the
WelcomePage.intro-login2: To provide the best assistance, please describe your questions in detail and include context such as files, images, commits, etc. It helps me to understand your needs and offer precise suggestions.
WelcomePage.intro-login3.1: Additionally, I can tackle complex coding tasks using various tools in Agent Mode. You can also enhance my functionality by integrating additional
WelcomePage.intro-login1.1.vpc: Hello, I'm Lingma, an AI Coding Assistant with you. It's pleasure to help you getting things done faster and better. You can ask me anything about coding. Read
WelcomePage.intro-login2.vpc: Describe your question in detail and give me more contexts, such as files, images, commits, etc. It can help me understand you better and provide better solutions and code suggestions.
WelcomePage.intro-developer-first: Hi, here is AI Developer of Lingma. I can assist you with a variety of programming tasks such as generating code based on requirements, resolving issues, unit testing, and more.
WelcomePage.intro-developer-second.1: Please provide detailed descriptions of your task along with any relevant context, such as files, images, etc. This information will assist me in generating more accurate solutions and code suggestions across multiple files. Visit
WelcomePage.intro: Hi, I'm Lingma, an AI Coding Assistant with you. Log in to Lingma and join the AI coding journey.
WelcomePage.input-tip: Type or paste an image to ask
WelcomePage.input-tip-asking: Continue or '/' to start a new chat
WelcomePage.developer-input-tip: Describe your task or issue in detail
WelcomePage.assistant-input-tip: Type or paste an image to ask, code, and more
Create.New.Conversation.Modal.Title: New Chat?
Create.New.Conversation.Modal.Content: The current chat will be terminated and all code suggestions that have not been accepted will be rejected.
help.1: Hello, I'm Lingma, an AI Coding Assistant with you. It's pleasure to help you getting things done faster and better.
help.2: You can talk to me as if you are talking to your workmate. In order to have a great conversation:
help.2.0: and start asking, I can response you based the selected code.
help.2.1: and contexts will be necessary, such as the selected code snippet, logs, error message, etc.
help.2.2: and review my code suggestion is qualified or not, tell me any issues or improvements, I will do better.
help.14: Generate unit tests for the selected code;
help.15: Generate method or inline comments for the selected code;
help.15.1: Generate optimization and related code suggestions for the selected code;
help.16: Clear context when you are in a conversation.
dislike.feedback.shareContext: Share the context of this current conversation (up to 5 Q&A exchanges)
chatTextArea.terminalPlaceholder: Ask how to do something in the terminal
chatTextArea.tools.openTooltip: Tools are enabled: Lingma will automatically search codebases and files for project-focused answers in Ask mode. If web tools are enabled, they will also assist.
chatTextArea.tools.closeTooltip: Not enabled yet: After enabling, Lingma will automatically search codebases and files for project-focused answers in Ask mode. If web tools are enabled, they will also assist.
WelcomePage.login.aliyun.description: You can visit www.aliyun.com to sign up.
WelcomePage.login.alibabacloud: Log in with Alibaba Cloud Account
WelcomePage.login.alibabacloud.descripti: You can visit www.alibabacloud.com to sign up.
WelcomePage.enterprise.dedicated: Log in with Enterprise Dedicated URL
no visible knowledge base: You do not have access to any knowledge bases, or the retrieval augmentation service is not enabled. Please contact your administrator for assistance.
no relevant documents found: The knowledge base does not contain the specific information you need,  the following response will be based on my current knowledge.
failed query RAG documents: System exception occur , please try again later.
chat.security.filter.status.blocked.resp: The enterprise administrator has enabled the AI Chat Security Filter. Your question matches with the corresponding rules and request is blocked. You can modified your question and asked again.
chat.security.filter.status.filtered.res: The administrator has enabled the AI Chat Security Filter. Your question has been protected.
diff.conflict.lens: The source file of the current file has been modified. Please confirm the content before accepting the changes.
diff.conflict.confirm.title: Accept the changes?
diff.conflict.confirm.detail: The source file of the current file has been modified. Please ensure that the changes have been confirmed. Please click the confirm button to accept after reviewing all changes.
WorkSpace.SnapShot.Name: SnapShot
WorkSpace.SnapShot.Switch.Modal.Title: Switch Snapshot？
WorkSpace.SnapShot.Switch.Modal.Content: This will undo all changes after this snapshot. You can restore them via switch to the “latest” later.

inline_edit.model.title: Model
inline_edit.nofile.msg: Please open the file you want to edit
inline_edit.editing.msg: Code is being modified, please try again later
terminal.cant.get.output.prompt: Unable to get terminal output due to user's VSCode version, unsupported terminal configuration, or other reasons. The command has been executed, but if needed, you can ask the user to share the terminal output with you.

Profile.policy.agreed: Allow Lingma to use my information for product improvements
Profile.improvement.plan.tips: With your permission, Lingma will use your code snippets and context for product improvements in suggestions and performance. See more information in
Profile.customized.commands.tips: The customized commands are configured by the administrator of the  organization on the console of Lingma. Here are commands for you.
Profile.security.filter.title: Security Filter
Profile.security.filter.dec: The security filter is configured by the administrator of the  organization on the console of Lingma.
Profile.memory.title: Memories
Profile.memory.desc: Memories are context that accumulate automatically to help Lingma respond to you better. They persist across all your conversations with Lingma and allow it to know you better over time.
